name: European Potato Processors' Association
goal:
EUPPA is the European Potato Processors' Association, which has been created in 1962 as the 'Union Europ√©enne des Industries Transformatrices de la Pomme de Terre (UEITP)'.

EUPPA is representing the most important European potato processing countries : Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Sweden and Great Britain.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Food safety and nutrition, sustainability, emissions and CSR, trade negotations and remedies
